LanguageData.NeedLearning.stages.learningstarved.desc: It's been so long since I learned anything new. I'm tired of the monotony!
LanguageData.NeedLearning.stages.learningdeprived.des: I want to learn more about all sorts of things. This place is boring!
LanguageData.NeedLearning.stages.learning_unfulfilled: I need more opportunities to learn and more time to study.
LanguageData.NeedLearning.stages.learning_satisfied.d: I've learned a lot recently! I'm looking forward to learning more.
LanguageData.NeedLearning.stages.learning_fully_satis: I've learned so much! I love all these new experiences.
LanguageData.NeedPlay.stages.really_wants_to_play.des: Why won't anybody play with me?
LanguageData.NeedPlay.stages.wants_to_play.label: wants to play
LanguageData.NeedPlay.stages.entertained.label: entertained
LanguageData.NeedPlay.stages.very_entertained.label: very entertained
